segments.text: I notice the warm light coming through the kitchen window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's concentrated on her dish-drying task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sink is overflowing terribly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's everywhere, pooling on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has no idea, standing there calmly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over by the open cabinet, the boy's on a stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's so unstable, he could topple any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Reaching for cookies, plate in handâ€”reckless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's looking up expectantly, arm outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's heartbreaking to think of the boy falling and getting hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Or slipping on that wet floor with the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside seems safe and serene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn them to prevent the sadness.
segments.speaker: PAR
